document.full_text: the veteran left-hander mike hampton has retired, ending a 16-year big-league career after giving up on a bid to earn a roster spot with the arizona diamondbacks.
document.title: mike hampton retires after 16-year career
lines_and_colors: the veteran left-hander mike hampton has retired, ending a 16-year big-league career after giving up on a bid to earn a roster spot with the arizona diamondbacks.
